summary: The bill, titled the Restoring America’s Floodplains Act, aims to amend the Agricultural Credit Act of 1978. It authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to provide financial and technical assistance for restoring wetlands on floodplain easements. It also grants the Secretary sole discretion in managing these easements through agreements with landowners and organizations, focusing on vegetative cover maintenance, and wetland restoration. The act has multiple sections outlining the restoration, management, modification and termination of floodplain easements.
